meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or copies.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out triplicate worksheets to each student.
meanings.sent2: The triplicate form needed to be signed by all three supervisors.
meanings.sent3: The triplicate ticket system at the amusement park confused the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The triplicate layers of the cake added depth to its flavor.
meanings.sent5: The triplicate colors of the flag symbolized unity, peace, and strength.

meanings.definition: To make three copies of something.
meanings.sent1: Please triplicate this document for our records.
meanings.sent2: The secretary triplicated the report for distribution.
meanings.sent3: The copier malfunctioned and triplicated every page.
meanings.sent4: The artist triplicates each sketch to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The machine can triplicate the image with just one click.

meanings.definition: A set of three identical things.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a triplicate of ancient vases.
meanings.sent2: She bought a triplicate of bracelets to share with her sisters.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved producing a triplicate of rabbits.
meanings.sent4: The package contained a triplicate of rare stamps.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to a triplicate of hidden treasures.
